author: Vexed (Vexed#3211)
name: Aliases
install_msg:
⚠️
This cog reads the config of the alias cog. This means it might break without much notice.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://vex-cogs.rtfd.io/en/latest/cogs/aliases.html?utm_source=cog&utm_medium=install_msg&utm_campaign=cog_level>
description: Get all the information you could ever need about a command's aliases.
short: Get all the information you could ever need about a command's aliases.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
